document_data.name: Dawn's Dress Shop
document_data.mainbody: '''Dawn's Dress Shop''' was a fine gown shop in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Location: Dawn's Dress Shop was located on [[East Market Street]] in the south section of the city.
document_data.Activities: The shop was owned and operated by [[Dawn (elf)|Dawn]], an [[elven]] seamstress. Many of Westgate's most fashionable ladies were clients of Dawn's Dress Shop.
